name: ASMR Surreal Toast Spread
promptTemplate: A super-realistic 8K close-up: showing a hand tilting and shaking a {container_type} to dump out {item_quantity} {miniature_items} onto a thick golden slice of freshly baked toast with a crispy surface. The miniature creatures tumble out chaotically, falling and bouncing in disoriented, off-balance poses - some landing upside down, others sideways, many stumbling and rolling as they hit the toast surface. They appear dizzy and confused from the sudden fall, wobbling unsteadily as they try to regain their footing with clumsy, awkward movements. Some are still spinning or flipping over from the impact, creating a scene of adorable chaos and disarray. Then using a knife to attempt to spread these disoriented, stumbling miniature items on the toast, but they continue to be wobbly and unbalanced - the living creatures keep struggling to stand upright while being gently nudged by the knife, some still dizzy and swaying, others crawling or rolling around in confused circles. The knife slowly and smoothly glides across the toast, but the miniature items resist being spread while still recovering from their tumbling fall, creating an extraordinary and surreal texture as these tiny, unsteady objects continue their disoriented movements while being gently pressed across the bread surface. The whole scene has unique sounds of the animated objects tumbling, bouncing, and moving clumsily against the bread, all softly illuminated by warm studio lights. The shallow depth of field blurs the background, focusing on the texture of the toast and the bizarre yet captivating spread of these living, stumbling miniature beings. Shot from top to bottom, ASMR cooking video perspective - creating maximum visual shock through the contrast of inanimate cooking actions with lively, disoriented miniature creatures.
